prompt: Process incoming Greek business emails from the last 24 hours. I need automatic detection of invoices, AADE notifications, and client payment inquiries. Send appropriate Greek responses and forward documents to the accounting system.
expectations: Scans multiple email accounts for Greek business communications
Identifies Greek invoices using keywords like 'Ï„Î¹Î¼Î¿Î»ÏŒÎ³Î¹Î¿' and 'Î±Ï€Î¿Î´ÎµÎ¹Î¾Î·'
Detects AADE government emails and treats them as high priority
Recognizes client payment inquiries and status requests
Generates appropriate Greek language responses
Extracts and processes document attachments
Forwards processed documents to accounting workflows
Creates summary report of processing actions taken

files.name: sample_greek_emails.json

prompt: Set up automated email monitoring for a Greek accounting firm. Configure Gmail and Outlook integration to monitor for invoices, bank statements, and government notifications. Include Greek language templates for automatic responses.
expectations: Configures Gmail API integration with appropriate OAuth scopes
Sets up Outlook/Exchange integration with Microsoft Graph API
Creates email filters for Greek document types and government communications
Establishes monitoring intervals and processing priorities
Generates Greek language response templates for common scenarios
Sets up automated forwarding rules to appropriate processing systems
Creates alert configuration for critical government notifications
Establishes secure handling procedures for sensitive financial emails

files.name: email_config.yaml
files.content:
accounts:
  primary_business:
    provider: "gmail"
    email: "accounting@company.gr"
    api_key: "placeholder"
    monitoring_enabled: true
    
  government_notifications:
    provider: "gmail" 
    email: "compliance@company.gr"
    priority: "critical"
    monitoring_enabled: true
    
  client_communications:
    provider: "outlook"
    email: "info@company.gr"
    auto_responses: true
    monitoring_enabled: true
    
filters:
  invoices:
    keywords: ["Ï„Î¹Î¼Î¿Î»ÏŒÎ³Î¹Î¿", "Î±Ï€Î¿Î´ÎµÎ¹Î¾Î·", "invoice"]
    file_types: [".pdf", ".xml"]
    
  government:
    senders: ["@aade.gr", "@efka.gov.gr", "@gov.gr"]
    priority: "high"
    
  banking:
    senders: ["@alphabank.gr", "@nbg.gr", "@eurobank.gr"]
    keywords: ["statement", "ÎºÎ¯Î½Î·ÏƒÎ· Î»Î¿Î³Î±ÏÎ¹Î±ÏƒÎ¼Î¿Ï"]
    
response_templates:
  invoice_confirmation:
    subject: "Î•Ï€Î¹Î²ÎµÎ²Î±Î¯Ï‰ÏƒÎ· Ï€Î±ÏÎ±Î»Î±Î²Î®Ï‚ Ï„Î¹Î¼Î¿Î»Î¿Î³Î¯Î¿Ï…"
    language: "greek"
    
  payment_status:
    subject: "Î•Î½Î·Î¼Î­ÏÏ‰ÏƒÎ· ÎºÎ±Ï„Î¬ÏƒÏ„Î±ÏƒÎ·Ï‚ Ï€Î»Î·ÏÏ‰Î¼Î®Ï‚" 
    language: "greek"

prompt: Process a batch of Greek bank emails containing account statements from Alpha Bank, National Bank, and Eurobank. Extract statements, verify sender authenticity, and integrate with the bank reconciliation system.
expectations: Identifies emails from legitimate Greek bank domains
Verifies sender authenticity and flags suspicious emails
Extracts bank statement attachments safely
Recognizes different Greek bank statement formats
Parses account numbers and statement periods
Integrates extracted data with reconciliation workflows
Generates processing summary with bank-specific details
Maintains security protocols for sensitive banking information

prompt: Handle urgent AADE email notification about a tax audit request. The email is in Greek and requires immediate escalation, document preparation, and client notification. Generate appropriate response workflow.
expectations: Immediately identifies email as critical AADE audit notification
Triggers high-priority alert system (SMS + email)
Parses Greek audit request details (deadline, required documents)
Creates urgent task in task management system
Generates client notification about audit requirement
Prepares standard audit document checklist
Schedules legal consultation if needed
Maintains complete audit trail of response actions

prompt: Configure automatic Greek language responses for common client inquiries. Include templates for payment confirmations, document requests, and appointment scheduling. Ensure professional Greek business communication standards.
expectations: Creates comprehensive Greek language response templates
Includes proper Greek business etiquette and formal language
Handles various client inquiry types (payments, documents, appointments)
Provides personalization variables for client names and details
Includes appropriate Greek salutations and closings
Ensures grammatically correct Greek with proper accents
Sets up automated trigger conditions for each template type
Maintains professional tone suitable for accounting services

files.name: greek_response_templates.json
